text: The Russian Volleyball Super League (RVSL) () is the top league of Russian professional volleyball. It was founded in 1992, and it is considered to be the continuer of the Soviet top league, founded in 1933. ==Russian volleyball Champions== {| class="wikitable" |- !Year !Gold !Silver !Bronze |-
